Posts.Content: Patty4 wrote: My CT scan last week showed a blood clot in the iliac vein......not sure where it came from. Maybe my oophorectomy (but that was 10 mos ago)? Maybe some meds? Took Tamox from 2/08 thru 11/08, then xeloda 11/08 til last week. Now I am taking daily shots of heparin, on top of everything else...and they hurt! Wondering if anyone else had similar experience???Â  Patty Dx 11/11/2008, IDC, Stage IV, 2/17 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
